comments:
Open a file using File > Open File... by specifying the name of an existing
directory in the file-open-dialog. Edit the file, save and close. A
FileNotFoundException is logged, but the UI remains silent and the user doesn't
know what happed to his file. There is not trace of it in the file system.

Created an attachment (id=26930)
